title: The Devil's Companion: A Guide to Nick Englebrecht's World
description: Before you read The Devil You Know, learn all you can about Nickt's world of witches, demons and other nasty things that go bump in the night, including the different castes of angels, the shady characters that populate the town of Blackwater, and the cults striving to claim the Godhead for their own nefarious purposes. The Devil's Companion includes a full glossary of terms, three chapters of The Devil You Know and its sequel, The Devil Dances, a previously unpublished Nick Englebrecht short, "And Death Shall Have No Dominion," a playlist where you can listen to the music that inspired the books, and beautiful, full-color artwork depicting the devil down through the ages. With special introduction by Ramsey Campbell. Cited a cross between Fifty Shades of Grey and the Dresden Files, the Nick Englebrecht series tackles the issues of heaven, hell, and all the dark places between.
author: K.H. Koehler
